maqras.text: 75|1|main shapath leta hoon qyaamat (pralay) ke din[1] kee
75|2|tatha shapath leta hoon ninda[1] karane vaalee antaraatma kee.
75|3|kya manushy samajhata hai ki ham ekatr nahin kar sakenge dobaara usakee asthiyon ko
75|4|kyon nahin? ham saamarthvaan hain is baat par ki seedhee kar den, usakee ungaliyon kee por-por.
75|5|balki manushy chaahata hai ki vah kukarm karata rahe apane aage[1] bhee.
75|6|vah prashn karata hai ki kab aana hai pralay ka din
75|7|to jab chundhiya jaayegee aankh.
75|8|aur gahana jaayega chaand.
75|9|aur ekatr kar diye[1] jaayenge soory aur chaand.
75|10|kahega manushy us din ki kahaan hai bhaagane ka sthaan
75|11|kadaapi nahin, koee sharanaagaar nahin.
75|12|tere paalanahaar kee or hee us din jaakar rukana hai.
75|13|soochit kar diya jaayega manushy ko us din usase, jo usane aage bheja tatha jo peechhe[1] chhoda.
75|14|balki manushy svayan apane virudhd ek khula[1] pramaan hai.
75|15|chaahe vah kitane hee bahaane banaaye.
75|16|he nabee! aap na hilaayen[1] apanee zubaan, taaki sheeghr yaad kar len is quraan ko.
75|17|nishchay hamapar hai use yaad karaana aur use padhaana.
75|18|atah, jab ham use padh len, to aap usake peechhe padhen.
75|19|phir hamaare hee oopar hai, usaka arth bataana.
75|20|kadaapi nahin[1], balki tum prem karate ho sheeghr praapt hone vaalee cheez (sansaar) se.
75|21|aur chhod dete ho paralok ko.
75|22|bahut-se mukh us din praphull honge.
75|23|apane paalanahaar kee or dekh rahe honge.
75|24|aur bahut-se mukh udaas honge.
75|25|vah samajh rahe honge ki unake saath kada vyavahaar kiya jaayega.
75|26|kadaapi nahin[1], jab pahunchegee praan hansaliyon (galon) tak.
75|27|aur kaha jaayegaah kaun jhaad-phoonk karane vaala hai
75|28|aur vishvaas ho jaayega ki ye (sansaar se) judaee ka samay hai.
75|29|aur mil jaayegee pindalee, pindalee[1] se.
75|30|tere paalanahaar kee or usee din jaana hai.
75|31|to na usane saty ko maana aur na namaaz padhee.
75|32|kintu jhuthalaaya aur munh pher liya.
75|33|phir, gaya apane parijanon kee or akadata haa.
75|34|shok hai tere lie, phir shok hai.
75|35|phir shok hai tere lie, phir shok hai.
75|36|kya manushy samajhata hai ki vah chhod diya jaayega vyarth
75|37|kya vah nahin tha veery kee boond, jo (garbhaashay mein) boond-boond giraee jaatee hai.
75|38|phir vah bandha rakt hua, phir allaah ne use paida kiya aur use baraabar banaaya.
75|39|phir usaka jodaah nar aur naaree banaaya.
75|40|to kya vah saamarthyavaan nahin ki murdon ko jeevit kar de
76|1|kya vyateet hua manushy par yug ka ek samay, jab vah koee vicharchit[1] vastu na tha
76|2|hamane hee paida kiya manushy ko mishrit (mile hue) veery[1] se, taaki usakee pareeksha len aur banaaya use sunane tatha dekhane vaala.
76|3|hamane use raah darsha dee.[1] (ab) vah chaahe to krtagy bane athava krtaghn.
76|4|nihsandeh, hamane taiyaar kee kaafiron (krtaghnon) ke lie zanjeer tatha tauq aur dahakatee agni.
76|5|nishchay sadaachaaree (krtagy) piyenge aise pyaale se jisamen kapoor mishrit hoga.
76|6|ye ek srot hoga, jisase allaah ke bhakt piyenge. use baha le jaayenge (jahaan chaahenge).
76|7|jo (sansaar mein) pooree karate rahe manotiyaan[1] aur darate rahe us din se[2] jisakee aapada chaaron or phailee huee hogee.
76|8|aur bhojan karaate rahe us (bhojan) ko prem karane ke baavajood, nirdhan, anaath aur bandee ko.
76|9|(apane man mein ye sochakar) ham tumhen bhojan karaate hain keval allaah kee prasannata ke lie. tumase nahin chaahate hain koee badala aur na koee krtagyata.
76|10|ham darate hain apane paalanahaar se, us din se, jo ati bheeshan tatha ghor hoga.
76|11|to bacha liya allaah ne unhen us din kee aapada se aur pradaan kar diya praphullata tatha prasannata.
76|12|aur unhen pratiphal diya unake dhairy ke badale svarg tatha reshamee vastr.
76|13|ve takiye lagaaye usamen takhton par baithe honge. na usamen dhoop dekhenge na kada sheet.
76|14|aur jhuke honge unapar us (svarg) ke saaye aur bas mein kiye honge usake phalon ke guchchhe poornatah.
76|15|tatha phiraaye jaayenge unapar chaandee ke bartan tatha pyaale jo sheeshon ke honge.
76|16|chaandee ke sheeshon ke, jo ek anumaan se bharenge.
76|17|aur pilaaye jaayenge usamen aise bhare pyaale, jisamen sonth milee hogee.
76|18|ye ek srot hai us (svarg) mein, jisaka naam salasabeel hai.
